Ubuntu support in Nepal project supports Ubuntu desktop users in Nepal. The volunteers are ready to give Ubuntu users online support. Overall, the Gnu/Linux distribution is growing at the moment. Users should join in and support each other. 

== Primary resources ==
- #ubuntu-np@irc.freenode.net has been registered. Users can start using the channel using an IRC client
- ubuntu-np@lists.ubuntu.com is in the process of being registered

== Secondary resources ==
- Mailing list is at foss-nepal@googlegroups.com
- Free and Open Source society of Nepal - http://www.fossnepal.org
- Anyone willing to setup http://www.ubuntu.org.np ?

== Other resource ==
- For training materials & resource persons go to www.sixyadaan.org
